channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Rob Reiner, Director of ‘Misery,’ ‘Princess Bride,’ Dead at 78
item.description: He also directed 'Stand By Me,' 'A Few Good Men,' 'When Harry Met Sally,' 'This Is Spinal Tap,' and many more.

item.title: How iRobot lost its way home
item.description: iRobot survived three decades of competition, but couldn't survive European regulators killing its Amazon buyout. Now it's being taken over by its own supplier in bankruptcy court.
